Class Enemies

java.lang.Object
Enemies
public class Enemies extends Object
Class which stores enemy creatures.

  • Method Details

    • checkEnemyCreatureDeath

      public String checkEnemyCreatureDeath(EnemyCreature thisCreature)
      Method to check death of enemy creature and move their list to the dead list if so.
      Parameters:
      thisCreature - The enemy creature to check as an EnemyCreature.
      Returns:
      The death (if it occurred) of the enemy creature as a string.

    • displayEnemy

      public String displayEnemy()
      Method to display details of the enemy creatures.
      Returns:
      List of alive enemy creatures as a string.

    • getAliveEnemyCreatures

      public ArrayList<EnemyCreature> getAliveEnemyCreatures()
      Accessor Method to return alive enemy creatures.
      Returns:
      Alive enemy creatures as an ArrayList.

    • getDeadEnemyCreatures

      public ArrayList<EnemyCreature> getDeadEnemyCreatures()
      Accessor Method to return dead enemy creatures.
      Returns:
      Dead enemy creatures as an ArrayList.

    • getEnemyCreatureAtLocation

      public EnemyCreature getEnemyCreatureAtLocation(GameLocation gameLocation)
      Method to return enemy creature at a particular game location.
      Parameters:
      gameLocation - The game location to check for an enemy creature as a GameLocation
      Returns:
      The enemy creature at the game location if any as an EnemyCreature.

    • getEnemyCreatureByFullName

      public EnemyCreature getEnemyCreatureByFullName(String fullName)
      Method to search for an enemy creature by its full name.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The name of the enemy creature being searched as a string.
      Returns:
      The enemy creature being searched as an EnemyCreature.

    • getMenuOptionsAliveEnemy

      public String[] getMenuOptionsAliveEnemy()
      Method to return list of alive enemy creatures as menu options.
      Returns:
      List of alive enemy creatures as string array.

    • rollToCreateEnemyCreature

      public String rollToCreateEnemyCreature(GameLocation gameLocation)
      Method to determine if new enemy creature created at game location.
      Parameters:
      gameLocation - Location to create new creature as GameLocation.
      Returns:
      Result of determination as a string.
